00003 ToasterHumanReader::ToasterHumanReader(ros::NodeHandle& node, bool fullHuman) {
00004     fullHuman_ = fullHuman;
00005     std::cout << "[area_manager] Initializing ToasterHumanReader" << std::endl;
00006 
00007     // Starts listening to the topic
00008     sub_ = node.subscribe("/pdg/humanList", 1, &ToasterHumanReader::humanJointStateCallBack, this);
00009 }
00010 
00011 void ToasterHumanReader::humanJointStateCallBack(const toaster_msgs::HumanList::ConstPtr& msg) {
00012     //std::cout << "[area_manager][DEBUG] new data for human received with time " << msg->humanList[0].meAgent.meEntity.time  << std::endl;
00013     Human * curHuman;
00014     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < msg->humanList.size(); i++) {
00015 
00016         // If this human is not assigned we have to allocate data.
00017         if (lastConfig_.find(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.meEntity.id) == lastConfig_.end()) {
00018             curHuman = new Human(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.meEntity.id);
00019         } else
00020             curHuman = lastConfig_[msg->humanList[i].meAgent.meEntity.id];
00021 
00022         std::vector<double> humanOrientation;
00023         bg::model::point<double, 3, bg::cs::cartesian> humanPosition;
00024 
00025         Mobility curHumanMobility = FULL;
00026         curHuman->setId(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.meEntity.id);
00027         curHuman->setName(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.meEntity.name);
00028 
00029         curHuman->setMobility(curHumanMobility);
00030         curHuman->setTime(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.meEntity.time);
00031         curHuman->busyHands_ = msg->humanList[i].meAgent.busyHands;
00032 
00033         humanPosition.set<0>(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.meEntity.positionX);
00034         humanPosition.set<1>(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.meEntity.positionY);
00035         humanPosition.set<2>(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.meEntity.positionZ);
00036         curHuman->setPosition(humanPosition);
00037 
00038         humanOrientation.push_back(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.meEntity.orientationRoll);
00039         humanOrientation.push_back(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.meEntity.orientationPitch);
00040         humanOrientation.push_back(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.meEntity.orientationYaw);
00041         curHuman->setOrientation(humanOrientation);
00042 
00043         lastConfig_[curHuman->getId()] = curHuman;
00044 
00045         //TODO: fullHuman
00046         if (fullHuman_) {
00047             Joint * curJnt;
00048             for (unsigned int i_jnt = 0; i_jnt < msg->humanList[i].meAgent.skeletonNames.size(); i_jnt++) {
00049 
00050                 // If this joint is not assigned we have to allocate data.
00051                 if (lastConfig_[curHuman->getId()]->skeleton_[msg->humanList[i].meAgent.skeletonNames[i_jnt] ] == NULL) {
00052                     curJnt = new Joint(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.skeletonJoint[i_jnt].meEntity.id, msg->humanList[i].meAgent.meEntity.id);
00053                 } else
00054                     curJnt = lastConfig_[curHuman->getId()]->skeleton_[msg->humanList[i].meAgent.skeletonNames[i_jnt] ];
00055 
00056                 std::vector<double> jointOrientation;
00057                 bg::model::point<double, 3, bg::cs::cartesian> jointPosition;
00058 
00059                 curJnt->setName(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.skeletonNames[i_jnt]);
00060                 curJnt->setAgentId(curHuman->getId());
00061                 curJnt->setTime(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.skeletonJoint[i_jnt].meEntity.time);
00062 
00063                 jointPosition.set<0>(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.skeletonJoint[i_jnt].meEntity.positionX);
00064                 jointPosition.set<1>(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.skeletonJoint[i_jnt].meEntity.positionY);
00065                 jointPosition.set<2>(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.skeletonJoint[i_jnt].meEntity.positionZ);
00066                 curJnt->setPosition(jointPosition);
00067 
00068                 jointOrientation.push_back(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.skeletonJoint[i_jnt].meEntity.orientationRoll);
00069                 jointOrientation.push_back(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.skeletonJoint[i_jnt].meEntity.orientationPitch);
00070                 jointOrientation.push_back(msg->humanList[i].meAgent.skeletonJoint[i_jnt].meEntity.orientationYaw);
00071                 curJnt->setOrientation(jointOrientation);
00072 
00073                 lastConfig_[curHuman->getId()]->skeleton_[curJnt->getName()] = curJnt;
00074             }
00075         }
00076     }
00077 }
00078 
00079 bool ToasterHumanReader::isPresent(unsigned int id) {
00080     timeval curTime;
00081     gettimeofday(&curTime, NULL);
00082     unsigned long now = curTime.tv_sec * pow(10, 9) + curTime.tv_usec;
00083     unsigned long timeThreshold = pow(10, 9);
00084     //std::cout << "current time: " << now <<  "  human time: " << m_LastTime << std::endl;
00085     long timeDif = lastConfig_[id]->getTime() - now;
00086     //std::cout << "time dif: " << timeDif << std::endl;
00087 
00088     if (fabs(timeDif) < timeThreshold)
00089         return true;
00090     else
00091         return false;
00092 }
